About Me

Hi, my name is Josh Tucker. I'm ex-Army and have been for nearly 6 years. I was stationed in Kaiserslautern, Germany on a kasserne called Kleber. I did one deployment to Kuwait which is technically a warzone (Although I wouldn't call it that.) I hope one day to live in Germany as a Civilian. My hobbies include gaming, reading, and running (Even though I haven't done it in two years, I'm going to include it. I hope to get back into running.) I've got a pet parrot named Laverne who loves to dance, and is a drama queen.

Cheers!
